resources.string: Go back to the menu to start a new game.
Are you sure you want to quit?

how to play choose a category (if applicable) the player will be given a word that the player will have to guess. the player will guess one letter at a time. the player will guess a letter by selecting a button and then pressing it. is the letter is in the word then the letter will be written everywhere it appears in the word. is the letter is not part of the word, one bodypart will be drawn into the gallows (head, body, left arm, right arm, left leg, right leg). the player will continue to guess letters until either the word is complete or all the body parts are drawn into the gallows and the man is hung.
